content.question: An object is moving along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis under the influence of a variable net force <math alttext="F sub net" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>net</mi></msub></mstyle></math>. The work done on the object as a function of the displacement, <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>, of the object (for values of displacement <math alttext="x greater than 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn></math>) is <math alttext="W equals the fraction a over x squared, end fraction, minus the fraction b over x, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math> and <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>b</mi></math> are constants with appropriate units. Which of the following is a correct expression for the net force <math alttext="F sub net" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>net</mi></msub></mstyle></math> exerted on the object as a function of displacement?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction a over x cubed, end fraction, minus the fraction b over x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction b over x squared, end fraction, minus the fraction 2 a over x cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative fraction a over x, end fraction, minus b times the natural log of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>ln</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction a over x, end fraction, minus b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction b over x squared, end fraction, minus the fraction 2 a over x cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
